name: Jason Chan
home:
Hello and a warm welcome to my portfolio website!

My name is Jason, and I'm excited to have you here. As you navigate through these digital pages, you'll discover a diverse range of projects that reflect my passion, skills, and dedication.

Every project tells a unique story of overcoming challenges, bringing ideas to life, and solutions crafted with care. With every line of code, every pixel meticulously placed, I strive to create experiences that leave a lasting impression.

Whether you're an industry professional, a fellow enthusiast, or simply curious about what I can bring to the table, I invite you to delve into my collection of completed projects. Each one is a testament to my expertise, creativity, and attention to detail. Feel free to reach out should you want to connect.

Thank you for joining me on this journey.
description:
Hi, I'm Jason! I'm a Civil Engineer wanting to transition into Software Engineering.

As a Civil Engineer turned Software Developer, I bring a unique perspective to the world of programming.

I began my professional career as a Civil Engineer, contributing to projects such as HS2 and Hurontario Light Rail Transit. In these projects, I worked as a designer, delivering intricate designs and conducting in-depth structural analyses for clients. However, as I completed these projects, I realised that my true passion lay in coding.

Seeking to deepen my programming knowledge, I pursued further education to expand my skill set. I dedicated myself to online courses in JavaScript, refining my coding skills through platforms like FreeCodeCamp and Codecademy. Seeking a more immersive learning experience, I enrolled in Northcoders' 13-week Software Development Course. Throughout this course, I successfully completed several projects that showcase my growth and abilities. You can explore these projects in the dedicated 'Projects' section of my portfolio.

Since graduating from the Bootcamp Course, I have remained committed to continuous learning. I actively challenge myself by regularly taking on coding katas. Additionally, I have developed both the backend and frontend of this very website you are currently exploring.

Below is a timeline of my career; feel free to take a look!

Now, I am ready for my next adventure in the world of Software Development. If you have any exciting opportunities or would like to connect, feel free to get in touch!

timeline.title: Northcoders - Junior Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: 13-Week Software Development Bootcamp Course, where I acquired comprehensive knowledge in both Backend and Frontend development. The course focused on JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL, equipping me with essential skills in these technologies. I developed a strong foundation in JavaScript, mastering key concepts such as higher-order functions, asynchronous functions, and promises. Collaborative work was emphasised, and I gained valuable experience working in pairs. Furthermore, I gained proficiency in unit testing techniques and applied principles of Test-Driven Development, utilising Jest Matchers to ensure the delivery of high-quality code.

timeline.title: Arcadis - Assistant Civil Engineer
timeline.description: As a Designer for HS2, I played a pivotal role in delivering crucial bridges, utilising advanced structural analysis tools and Excel to perform calculations. I oversaw the production of drawings and 3D models by delegating tasks to CAD technicians. Additionally, I prepared comprehensive design solutions through detailed reports, showcasing final designs, numerical analysis, and data visualisations. During the Hurontario Light Rail Project, I actively engaged in interdisciplinary design meetings, collaborating with professionals from India, Canada, and the Netherlands to ensure seamless project coordination.

timeline.title: Friars School
timeline.description: A-Levels: Mathematics (A*), Further Mathematics (A*), Physics(A*), Chemistry(A*)
